text: رَبِّ إِنَّهُنَّ أَضۡلَلۡنَ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِۖ فَمَن تَبِعَنِي فَإِنَّهُۥ مِنِّيۖ وَمَنۡ عَصَانِي فَإِنَّكَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

translation.en: My Lord, indeed they have led astray many among the people. So whoever follows me - then he is of me; and whoever disobeys me - indeed, You are [yet] Forgiving and Merciful
translation.id: Ya Tuhan, berhala-berhala itu telah menyesatkan banyak manusia. Barangsiapa mengikutiku, maka orang itu termasuk golonganku, dan barangsiapa mendurhakaiku, maka Engkau Maha Pengampun, Maha Penyayang
